content: -this hat complements the riddari sweater pattern using four colors of leftover léttlopi partial skeins -some row use three colors which can be moderately difficult -gauge is 18 st and 24 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 measured over st st using us size 8 needles -size is approximately 8 height and 21 circumference -this is being published as a free pattern i have made the pattern a few times but if errors are found and edits are needed i will update as needed
